parameter.comment: Precision in particle interaction 0:Simple, 1:Double, 2:Uses and saves double (default=0)
Step Algorithm 1:Verlet, 2:Symplectic (default=1)
Verlet only: Number of steps to apply Euler timestepping (default=40)
Interaction Kernel 1:Cubic Spline, 2:Wendland, 3:Gaussian (default=2)
Viscosity formulation 1:Artificial, 2:Laminar+SPS (default=1)
Viscosity value
Multiply viscosity value with boundary (default=1)
DeltaSPH value, 0.1 is the typical value, with 0 disabled (default=0)
Shifting mode 0:None, 1:Ignore bound, 2:Ignore fixed, 3:Full (default=0)
Coefficient for shifting computation (default=-2)
Threshold to detect free surface. Typically 1.5 for 2D and 2.75 for 3D (default=0)
Rigid Algorithm 1:SPH, 2:DEM (default=1)
Time to freeze the floatings at simulation start (warmup) (default=0)
Coefficient to calculate minimum time step dtmin=coefdtmin*h/speedsound (default=0.05)
Initial time step (default=h/speedsound)
Minimum time step (default=coefdtmin*h/speedsound)
Dt values are loaded from file (default=disabled)
Velocity of particles used to calculate DT. 1:All, 0:Only fluid/floating (default=0)
Time of simulation
Time out data
Minimum rhop valid (default=700)
Maximum rhop valid (default=1300)
%/100 of fluid particles allowed to be excluded from domain (default=1)
Increase of Z+ (default=0)
The domain is fixed with the specified values (xmin:ymin:zmin:xmax:ymax:zmax)
The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
The domain is fixed in the specified limit (default=not applied)
The domain is fixed as a function of the initial particle limits plus specified values (xmin:ymin:zmin:xmax:ymax:zmax)
The domain is fixed as a function of the initial particle limits plus specified value (default=0)
The domain is fixed as a function of the initial particle limits plus specified value (default=0)
The domain is fixed as a function of the initial particle limits plus specified value (default=0)
The domain is fixed as a function of the initial particle limits plus specified value (default=0)
The domain is fixed as a function of the initial particle limits plus specified value (default=0)
The domain is fixed as a function of the initial particle limits plus specified value (default=0)
Increase of Z with periodic BC in axis X
Increase of Y with periodic BC in axis X
Increase of X with periodic BC in axis Y
Increase of Z with periodic BC in axis Y
Increase of X with periodic BC in axis Z
Increase of Y with periodic BC in axis Z
Periodic BC in axes X and Y
Periodic BC in axes X and Z
Periodic BC in axes Y and Z
